name: The Forest
descr:
As the lone survivor of a passenger jet crash, you find yourself in a mysterious forest battling to stay alive against a society of cannibalistic mutants. 

Build, explore, survive in this terrifying first person survival horror simulator.[h2]Key  features[/h2]
Enter a living, breathing world, where every tree and plant can be chopped down. Below ground explore a vast network of caves and underground lakes. 

[list][li]Chop down trees to build a camp, or start a fire to keep warm. Scavenge food to keep yourself from starving. 
[/li][li]Build a small shelter or a large ocean side fortress. Lay traps and defences to keep a safe perimeter. 
[/li][li]Explore and build during the day. Defend your base at night. Craft weapons and tools. Bunker down during the evening or bring the fight directly to the enemy. 
[/li][li]Defend yourself against a clan of genetic mutant enemies that have beliefs, families, morals and that appear almost human. 
[/li][li]Use stealth to evade enemies, or engage them directly with crude weapons built from sticks and stones. [/li][/list]
